Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Relates to funds received pursuant to a New York opioid settlement sharing agreement
Summary: Relates to reporting on funds received pursuant to a New York opioid settlement sharing agreement.
LawCode: Amd ยง25.18, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to funds received pursuant to a New York opioid settlement sharing agreement
